title: Space Force top buyer says rapid commercial innovation is reshaping military space strategy
description:
Speaking at the 2025 SpaceNews Icon Awards, Purdy said the pace of progress outside government is setting the agenda for how the service develops technology.

The post Space Force top buyer says rapid commercial innovation is reshaping military space strategy appeared first on SpaceNews.
